title: Drawing, "Houses in a Valley, Colombia", August 8, 1853
medium:
Recto: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper
Verso: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457 c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457 d
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite at various locations with numbers, marks and:   grass / brown yellow / brownish / yellowish green / All trees like bushes / Browns, bluish greens / Broken greens / patches of bushes/ scattered bushes / yellow green; again, at upper center:   View near Popayan including the famous volcano of Purese / Popayan  Aug- //53 / Cauca River  Refer to pocket sketch book for / a more accurate sketch of the mountain; again, at upper right:   oo A splendid / narrow / streak of sunlight glanced across the land- / scape following the undulations of the / hills and trees in a most delightful manner / At another time the parts marked with back scratches were in deep shadow / Remember the ashes about the crater, the yellow / grass the whitest rocks, the trees below and / the numerous fields; again, upper far right:   2- green 3- yellowish 4- Brown / 5- Bushes 6- Bright yellow ripe corn / 7- Rock 8- scattered bushes and / brown rock and earth /  9 Bushes light green / 10- Rich orange ochre-  Break / 11- Green with yellow stalks of - maize / 12-  stone wall; again, at lower right:   not in the fore ground; and again at bottom center: E [with arrow pointing upward]

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at lower left: Red break in soil.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a valley of a plateau with the volcano seen at right center of background mountains, and small scattered houses at left, center and right middleground.

Verso:  Horizontal view of two houses in the foreground with more houses in a valley bordered by mountains in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Houses in a Valley, Colombia", August 8, 1853.
August 8, 1853. Recto: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper
Verso: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-91.
